issue.title: Sections: no error message on section selection limit

full_response.title: Sections: no error message on section selection limit
full_response.description:
At current moment backend allows to query only 100 sections. On front there are no limitations and selecting more will result in nothing. It will display that sections are selected, but no data loaded.

Organization: City MD (Christy.Koss46@hotmail.com)

>"message": "Maximum 100 sections allowed per query"

> [warning!]
> From the PBR: Remove limit for now. Frontend - show an error message.

key_points: Initial concern about enforcing 100 section limit
PBR decision: Remove the limit on backend
Discussion about guardrails and safety limits
Final decision: Increase limit to 1000 sections (not remove completely)

key_decisions: Issue requests increasing MaxSectionsPerQuery from 100 to 1000
Not removing limit completely to maintain performance guardrails
Backend-only change - no frontend error handling needed per final discussion

content.summary: Codex validated approach - proceeding with specification
key_findings: Two-file change is safe and complete
SQL Server 2100-parameter risk is pre-existing and acceptable
Simple constant change is correct solution

changes: Unit test updated to validate 1000 limit
content.test_status: specific test passed (database connection issues prevented full suite run - pre-existing)
